itunes:title: Exodus Week 6 with Raechel and Amanda
title: Exodus Week 6 with Raechel and Amanda
description:
In the sixth and final week of our Exodus reading plan, Raechel and Amanda discuss the beauty and provision we see in the building of the tabernacle. Every person, material, and process was intentional for God making a way for His people to come near to Him. Join us as we close out this rich book of the Bible and celebrate God’s gift of His presence that now indwells all believers. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 6 of the She Reads Truth Exodus reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Title collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/exodus-week-6-with-raechel-and-amanda
